name: Hareraiser: Finale
overview: The second part of 2 part adventure puzzle of animated graphics and text which contains the necessary information for you to complete the second half of the your search for the Golden Jeweled Hare. You will need to have completed part one of the game prior to playing this one. The contest was to win Hareraiser competition with prize up to £30.000,- or the fabulous Golden Jeweled Hare (made of 18 carat pure gold and gem set pendants). Each set of the game was marked with a unique serial number.
